snippet.title: Pull Stay Full Release Trailer [2025]
snippet.description:
After 7 years of development, my game Pull Stay is finally full-launched on 31 March 2025! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1179890/Pull_Stay/
Pull Stay is a wacky Beat 'em up game with Tower Defense mechanics. The game is filled with fun goofy vibes similar to Japanese comedy shows. At the same time, it revolves around the theme of Hikikomori, which means "shut-in" in Japanese. The game reflects the experience of the solo developer who has been a hikikomori himself.
